name: Hatfield Business Park
overview:
Hatfield Business Park has long been associated with innovation.

Hatfield Business Park is a thriving mixed use development set within a carefully landscaped environment. The park sits on 400 acres of the former Hatfield Aerodrome. Masterplanned by Goodman, the park now hosts 3.5 million sq ft of business space creating 10,000 jobs.

Elsewhere on the park there are over 2,000 homes, 18 retail units, Europe’s largest Health and Racquets club, a police station and a University campus.

With a 25 minute rail link to central London and the A1(M) link to the M25 close by, Hatfield Business Park offers an unrivalled mix of amenity and accessibility.
